articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Its resilience on full display, USMNT denies Costa Rica to reach Gold Cup semis - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Americans lost their second-half lead, but keeper Matt Freese starred in the shootout as his team prevailed, 4-3, following a 2-2 draw.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS A young U.S. mens national soccer team lost its poise late in regulation, then momentarily in the heat of a shootout. But with a Concacaf Gold Cup semifinal berth at stake, the Americans … [+6001 chars]
